body_content.explanation: a cake that is baked in a square or rectangular tin and then cut into squares or slices:
examples: I have a recipe for a gingerbread traybake.
Today I am going to make a cornflake, coconut and chocolate traybake.

body_content.explanation: a savoury dish (= one that is not sweet) consisting of several items of food cooked together in the oven in a square or rectangular tin:
examples: This easy Greek chicken traybake is packed with roasted peppers, tomatoes, olives and red onion.
He made a roast chicken tray bake with tomatoes and potatoes.
Simple and super quick to make, these traybake recipes are a perfect treat if you're short on time.
